name: zotero-citation-tally
description: Plugin that tallies citation counts for Zotero items
author: Dae Houlihan <dev@daeh.info> (https://daeh.info)

scripts.lint: ESLINT_USE_FLAT_CONFIG=true && NODE_ENV=production && prettier --config prettier.config.mjs --write . && eslint --config eslint.config.mjs --fix .
scripts.lint:check: ESLINT_USE_FLAT_CONFIG=true && NODE_ENV=production && prettier --config prettier.config.mjs --check . && eslint --config eslint.config.mjs .
scripts.lint:dev: ESLINT_USE_FLAT_CONFIG=true && NODE_ENV=development && prettier --config prettier.config.mjs --write . && eslint --config eslint.config.mjs --fix .
scripts.lint:repo: ESLINT_USE_FLAT_CONFIG=true && NODE_ENV=repo && prettier --config prettier.config.mjs --write . && eslint --config eslint.config.mjs --fix .
scripts.update-deps: yarn set version stable && yarn upgrade-interactive
